cast.name: 丹尼尔·萨夫雷 Danielle Savre
克里斯蒂·圣约翰 Christy St. John

introduction: A couple of years ago an incident happened in Sydney Australia that would make for a very compelling story. A young woman was at home studying for school exams when a man came into her house and strapped a bomb around her neck. A female police officer found her and sat with her for hours to keep her calm while the bomb was diffused. This was the inspiration for the short film COLLAR.The incident put two women from very different backgrounds in a life threatening situation together. One was there by design the other by choice. One has a bomb tied around her neck and the other is there to help keep her calm and save her life. One was a girl from a wealthy family in a wealthy suburb. One was a police officer.
